name: 3D FPS - Final
description:
This is my 3D First Person Shooter Project

My modifications:

1. Create a complete Interesting, comprehensive, and coherent level

2. Adding additional levels and tie them in to create logical progression

3. Add custom music to your game

           - Please note that for the custom music, despite having been able to add music to every single one of my other projects, this time, I was unable. I asked in the discussion forum as well as researched online and was unable to find an answer. I have added the music as a downloadable zip file as that was the only solution I could find in order to turn this in on time. I also was unable to get screenshots without pausing in order to use command shift 4. I apologize for the inconvenience.

Created by:

Sydney Upcraft
